title: Lygon Street

abstract: Carlton - Personal reminiscences of Lygon Street, Carlton.
description: Combines locational footage with personal reminiscences of Lygon St, Carlton. This film is an excerpt from 'Stories from the hidden city', a project conceived and directed by Bagryana Popov, 2000-2002.
